long_desc: Everyone wants to be the best dressed version of themselves. We want to know what is in and out of style, where we can buy the newest trends and what affects them. Trends are changing faster than ever before, and although this is positively affecting our closets, it is negatively affecting our wallets and the environment. In this course, we will be exploring the driving forces behind trends, how they have changed since the early 200s and how we can ensure that this fastpaced fashion culture does not negatively affect our environment.

custom_fields.goals: To inform students of how trends are changing and repeating To inform students of the causes of the repeating and changing trends To inform students of the effects of trend changes, how they affect the world around us and what steps we can take to combat negative effects
